Class InputValidation

java.lang.Object
InputValidation
public class InputValidation extends Object
class for validating various types of user inputs

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static Scanner
    scanner
    create new scanner object to use throughout the InputValidation class to read user input for validation scanner initialised with the standard input stream to facilitate interaction with the user via the console
